EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to users who have received activation, but not logged in.
EmailTemplate.name: ROLL-OUT: Checking on Login Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Checking-in: Salesforce.com Login Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!User.FirstName},
If you received your Salesforce.com Login Confirmation email and have not logged in, you can disregard this message. However, if you have not received a Salesforce.com Login Confirmation email, please notify your System Administrator by replying to this email.
Sincerely, Salesforce.com Implementation Team
